org.jbarcode
Class JBarcode

java.lang.Object
  org.jbarcode.JBarcode

public class JBarcode
extends java.lang.Object

A barcode class implemented using Java 2D APIs.
JBarcode coordinates three objects - BarcodeEncoder encode a text, BarcodePaint implements a stratergy to paint the code, and TextPainter implements the barcode text drawing - and several attibutes to achieve its aim of being able to draw a barcode on a Java 2D graphics device.

Since:
0.1
Author:
Flavio Sampaio
